lead_paragraph: About 60 U.N. employees, or about one quarter of the organization’s staff, will leave the country, the latest sign of Western fears as terror attacks have escalated in recent months.
snippet: About 60 U.N. employees, or about one quarter of the organization’s staff, will leave the country, the latest sign of Western fears as terror attacks have escalated in recent months.

headline.main: U.N. to Cut Foreign Staff in Pakistan for Safety
headline.print_headline: U.N. to Cut Foreign Staff In Pakistan For Safety
